overview:
Lawrence is CEO and co-founder of RowNine.com where he is responsible for the strategic direction of the company. Prior to co-founding RowNine, Lawrence worked for Yahoo! as vice president of Strategic Alliances. Lawrence led a team that managed major deals with Yahooâ€™s largest business partners; including Microsoft, Sony, Amazon and Visa, and was responsible for $300M in revenue. Prior to Yahoo!, Lawrence was a partner in an advertising agency in Vancouver overseeing strategy for key accounts.

While studying business at the University of British Columbia, Lawrence developed an enormous curiosity about the internet and its potential to access information, communicate and collaborate with others. Lawrenceâ€™s fascination with the internet and technology coupled with his longstanding passion for collecting rare and complicated timepieces (and the notion of creating a new way to connect luxury brands and consumers) is what led to the creation of RowNine.
